trans-unit.source: Provides a threading service that allows the host application creating a workflow instance to donate the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> on which the workflow instance is run.
trans-unit.target: 提供執行緒服務，該服務允許主應用程式建立工作流程執行個體，以提供工作流程執行個體執行所在的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" />。

trans-unit.source: Using this threading service, host applications can run a workflow instance on a single <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> in synchronous mode (although if the workflow contains a delay activity, the work is postponed until after the delay activity is executed on a separate thread spawned by <see cref="System.Threading.Timer" />).This mode blocks the execution of the host application until the workflow instance becomes idle.
trans-unit.target: 使用此執行緒服務，主應用程式可以在同步模式下針對單一 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> 執行工作流程執行個體 (但是如果工作流程包含延遲活動，工作則會延期，直到針對 <see cref="System.Threading.Timer" /> 所繁衍的個別執行緒執行延遲活動之後為止)。在工作流程執行個體變成閒置之前，此模式將無法執行主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Subsequently, the workflow instance can only be executed using the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow(System.Guid)" /> method of this service.
trans-unit.target: 接著，只有透過使用此服務的 <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow(System.Guid)" /> 方法才能執行工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService> does not automatically run a workflow instance that is in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService> 不會自動執行佇列中的工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The host must call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow%2A> to run a specified workflow.
trans-unit.target: 主機必須呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow%2A> 以執行指定的工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Boolean" /> that determines how delay activities are handled.
trans-unit.target: 判斷如何處理延遲活動的 <see langword="Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, the scheduler service automatically resumes workflows after delay activities expire (by using an in-memory timer).
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示排程器服務會在延遲活動到期後 (透過使用記憶體中的計時器)，自動繼續工作流程。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the host must manually resume the workflow after the delay activities expire.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> 表示主機必須在延遲活動到期後手動繼續工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that contains parameters for <c>useActiveTimers</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />，包含 <c>useActiveTimers</c> 的參數。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, the scheduler service automatically resumes workflows after delay activities expire (by using an in-memory timer).
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示排程器服務會在延遲活動到期後 (透過使用記憶體中的計時器)，自動繼續工作流程。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the host must manually resume the workflow after the delay activities expire.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> 表示主機必須在延遲活動到期後手動繼續工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the existing scheduled work item to cancel.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，與要取消的現有排程工作項目關聯。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the specified existing workflow instance work item.
trans-unit.target: 取消指定的現有工作流程執行個體工作項目。

trans-unit.source: Overloaded from <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted" />.
trans-unit.target: 多載自 <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called whenever <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime" /> is called and is used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> to do work that is needed when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> starts.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime" /> 時，會呼叫此方法，而且會由 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 使用此方法執行 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 啟動時所需要的工作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> for the workflow instance to run.
trans-unit.target: 要執行的工作流程執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 執行指定的工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workflow starts running; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流程開始執行則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This is a synchronous call that uses the current thread to run the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 這是使用目前的執行緒執行工作流程的同步呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It does not return until the workflow idles, suspends, completes, terminates, or aborts.
trans-unit.target: 它會直到工作流程閒置、暫止、完成、結束或中止時才會傳回。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="workflowInstanceId" /> is an empty GUID.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="workflowInstanceId" /> 是空的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Adds a workflow instance to the pending work items queue.
trans-unit.target: 將工作流程執行個體加入至暫止的工作項目佇列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitCallback" /> multicast delegate that represents the method to run.
trans-unit.target: 代表要執行之方法的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitCallback" /> 多點傳送委派。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 代表工作流程執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a workflow instance to the pending work items queue using the specified workflow instance using the specified multicast delegate.
trans-unit.target: 使用透過指定之多點傳送委派的指定工作流程執行個體，將工作流程執行個體加入至暫止的工作項目佇列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callback" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callback" /> 包含 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitCallback" /> multicast delegate that represents the method to run.
trans-unit.target: 代表要執行之方法的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitCallback" /> 多點傳送委派。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 代表工作流程執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that indicates the time to begin running the thread.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示開始執行執行緒的時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents the scheduled thread.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，表示排定的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified workflow instance to the pending work item queue using the specified multicast delegate, <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> and GUIDs.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的多點傳送委派、<see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 和 GUID，將指定的工作流程執行個體加入至暫止工作項目佇列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callback" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callback" /> 包含 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="workflowInstanceId" /> or <paramref name="timerId" /> is an empty GUID.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="workflowInstanceId" /> 或 <paramref name="timerId" /> 是空的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Overloaded from <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop" />.
trans-unit.target: 多載自 <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> uses this method to do work that is needed when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> stops.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService" /> 會使用此方法執行 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 停止時所需的工作。
